attributes.additional_details: to pay soldiers more than footballers or to put the money footballers earn towards ammo ect. for the army and the soldiers fight for this country politicians ask yourself this where would would we be now what kind of situation would we be in now if afghanistan started a war with us and we did nothing about it think of the people that would be killed think that they are soldiers fighting and dieing in everyday battles to secure your safety as a british citizen so come on how would you feel if you was risking your life on the front line to find out that there are a few men kicking a football around a field and getting payed thousands when soldiers are getting payed hundreds so i would take kindly if you discussed this issue
